name: FruitLand
summary:
Your children are a dream come true, the time you spend with them is a gift; playing, learning and having fun at the same time is a privilege.
Fruitland is simple and easy to play, especially in groups, it's fun for the whole family.
It has been developed for fun but also for teaching and recognising shapes and colours, counting, following rules, winning and losing.
It takes advantage of touch-screen capabilities (pinch to zoom, pan, swipe, touch, drag) and is not limited to making you turn the wheel because it is the player who moves the piece.
